name: 初颜 - The Prototype
description: Find yourself becoming Masato Gu - a desperate young physicist, and try to discover the truth about a lab accident five years ago in which you lost your love, with the Time Machine! But before that, will you succeed in clearing an unjust murder charge before running out of time…?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 725 MB available space
